articles.title: G7 Summit: Club of Rich Seek to Woo Fence-sitters to Build More Support as Ukraine Fallout Worsens
articles.description: The five emerging powers -- Argentina, India, Indonesia, Senegal and South Africa -- have become the object of the G7 industrialised powers' charm offensive
articles.content: The five emerging powers — Argentina, India, Indonesia, Senegal and South Africa — have become the object of the G7 industrialised powers’ charm offensive, as the club of rich nations seeks to build a broader support base in their backing for Kyiv. B... [4721 chars]

articles.title: What abortion laws and reproductive rights look like around the globe
articles.description: While countries like the United States, Poland and Russia are taking steps backwards, gains are being made in places such as Ireland, Colombia and Argentina.
articles.content: The global landscape of reproductive rights is constantly shifting. The United States Supreme Court ruling that has overturned Roe v Wade – the landmark 1973 decision that protected a woman’s right to have an abortion – marks a significant regression... [5644 chars]

articles.title: Modi pitches India’s emerging clean energy market at G7, urges member nations to invest
articles.description: G7 Summit held in Germany amid Russia-Ukraine war. India invited as partner country, along with Indonesia, Argentina, Senegal and South Africa.
articles.content: New Delhi: Prime Minister Narendra Modi Monday exhorted the Group of Seven (G7) countries to consider promoting and investing in India’s emerging market for clean energy technologies as he attended the G7 Summit in Germany amid the Russia-Ukraine war... [4109 chars]

articles.title: Argentina's Bioceres says its GMO wheat gets key OK from U.S. FDA
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, June 27 (Reuters) - Argentina's Bioceres said on Monday that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration had positively concluded a review of its genetically modified (GMO) drought resistant HB4 wheat, which it called a "key step" to commercializing it in the country.The HB4 wheat still needs approval from the U.S.

articles.title: Boris Johnson tells Argentina Falklands’ sovereignty is not in question
articles.description: Boris Johnson told Argentina’s President Alberto Fernandez that the sovereignty of the Falkland Islands is “not in question”.
articles.content:
Boris Johnson told Argentina’s President Alberto Fernandez that the sovereignty of the Falkland Islands is “not in question”.

articles.title: Wimbledon 2022: Rafael Nadal pain-free for first time in 'year and half'
articles.description: Second seed Rafael Nadal will play Argentina's world number 42 Francisco Cerundolo in the first round while young sensation Carlos Alcaraz will take on Germany's Jan-Lennard Struff.
